text.jpText:
『朝日杯FS』の出走前。
いつも鼻につけているテープを
切らしてしまったナリタブライアン。
text.enText:
Before running in the Asahi Cup FS, 
NARITABURIAN cut off the tape that she always 
wears on her nose. NARITABURIAN had cut off 
the tape that she always wears on her nose.

text.jpText:
トレーナーは1番効果の高いものをと、
店にあった全種類のテープを自腹で購入した。
トレーナーの散財に呆れるナリタブライアン。
text.enText:
The trainer bought all kinds of tapes in the 
store with her own money, hoping to get the 
most effective ones. Naritabu Bryan was 
appalled by the trainer's spending spree.

text.jpText:
だが大量のテープは『彼女ならどんな相手
でも勝ち続け、未来のレースでも必要になる』
というトレーナーからの信頼の形でもあった。
text.enText:
But the large amount of tape was also a sign 
of trust from her trainer, who said, "She 
will continue to win against any opponent, 
and you will need her in future races. Her 
trainer's trust that she would continue to 
win against any opponent, and that she would 
be needed in future races.

text.jpText:
ナリタブライアンは新しいテープを鼻につけ、
集中を高めてレースに臨むのだった。
text.enText:
Naritabryan put a new piece of 
tape on her nose to keep her focused 
and ready for the race.
